Package com.ibm.streams.management

Interface MetricMetadata

All Known Subinterfaces:
Metric
public interface MetricMetadata
MetricMetadata contains information about a measurement of an element. Metrics are available for resources and multiple job-related objects.
See Also:
  • InstanceMXBean.retrieveResourceMetrics(boolean)
  • InstanceMXBean.snapshotJobMetrics()
  • JobMXBean.snapshotMetrics()
  • PeMXBean.retrieveMetrics(boolean)
  • ResourceMXBean.retrieveMetrics()
